titles.title: SMART Act of 2025
Setting Manageable Analysis Requirements in Text Act of 2025
SMART Act of 2025
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve the effectiveness of major rules in accomplishing their regulatory objectives by promoting retrospective review, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
